comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Until I saw this photograph the words "prune washer" and "prune sizer" had never occurred to me, ever, in my life. Such is the richness of the OSU Flickr-Commons experience! I was equally fascinated to learn that the 2011 US National Average Salary for Prune Washers is $29,963. No word if that includes all the prunes you can eat. I wonder what they earned in 1943!

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: Sounds like a reference challenge -- that information must be somewhere in all these boxes we have!
